casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Willie MERRIWEATHER, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157889
COA: 341232 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 21, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion to add issues is GRANTED. The application for leave to appeal the May 22, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because the defendant has failed to meet the burden of establishing entitlement to relief under MCR 6.508(D).
